wikipedia_page.main: Edward Keith Davies (born 19 February 1934) is an English footballer, who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Tranmere Rovers.

response: Keith Davies is a Welsh Labour politician and was the National Assembly for Wales member for Llanelli from 2011 until 2016. He beat Helen Mary Jones who was the deputy leader of Plaid Cymru, and incumbent AM for Llanelli, in May 2011.
On 28 September 2012, Keith Davies was admitted to hospital being described as being seriously ill.
* Keith Davies (footballer), footballer for Tranmere Rovers
